org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.optimizer

Class QueryPlanPostProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.optimizer.QueryPlanPostProcessor

  • public class QueryPlanPostProcessor
extends Object
    Finds Acid FileSinkDesc objects which can be created in the physical (disconnected) plan, e.g. GenTezUtils.removeUnionOperators(GenTezProcContext, BaseWork, int) so that statementId can be properly assigned to ensure unique ROW__IDs UnionProcFactory is another example where Union All optimizations create new FileSinkDescS

      Constructors
